FWOriginal Message From Gilbertsmith Doug Sent Wednesday October AM To Trefz Greg Subject RE this is exactly right we need to basically create a distribution that does not get influenced by temps Original Message From Trefz Greg Sent Wednesday October AM To Seksaria Rahul Cc Gilbertsmith Doug Subject Rahul Per our conversation please follow up with research and ake the following changes to the current model We want the model to use the desks hourly scalars We also want to be able to differentiate the scalars for each year The current historical data the model uses is not applicable to the ERCOT market We want to able to control the number of jump hours and days and control the range of prices for those jumps for positive and negative pricing We also would like to control this and change it for each individual year Model must be capable of positive and negative pricing Please get a timeline on when this can be completed Doug if you have anything more that you want to be able to control in the model please let me know and I will make sure it gets done Regards Greg
